pullRequest.title: SAK-43845: SWITCH: Podcasts: Use permissions widget
pullRequest.bodyText:
Merged permissions.properties files into Messages.properties.
Adapted to permissions webcomponent.
Update PermissionsEntitiyProvider: filter "all.groups" permissions
Updated sakai-permissions: Two new attributes
** group-reference
** disabled-groups
Removed unused bean: podPermBean

nodes.bodyText: You should either document this at the top of the class, using jsdoc syntax, or you could control the state by implementing setters for groupReference and disableGroups. I understand this issue with attribute order and I've wrestled with it myself. I usually sort it out by using setters. But, just documenting this in the class js doc will do, with a tag example

commit.message:
SAK-43845: SWITCH: Podcasts: Use permissions widget

* Merged permissions.properties files into Messages.properties.
* Adapted to permissions webcomponent.
* Update PermissionsEntitiyProvider: filter "all.groups" permissions
* Updated sakai-permissions: Two new attributes
** group-reference
** disabled-groups
* Removed unused bean: podPermBean
